docs.title: Home
docs.text:
The RingCentral Javascript SDK allows developers building client and server-side javascript applications to interface with the following RingCentral APIs more easily:

  • Voice
  • Messaging, e.g. Fax, SMS, voicemail, etc.
  • Glip Team Messaging
  • Call Management
  • Meetings

docs.title: Registering your application
docs.text: Before you begin development, you will first need to register your application via the RingCentral Developer Console. This step will provision your application a unique set of credentials used to identify your application on the network, and comes with the benefits listed below.
